name: initialize
description: Initializes the MCP server and sets dynamic environment variables.

name: health
description: Checks the health and authentication status of the MCP server.

name: list-files
description: Lists all files in the connected Google Drive folder.

name: read-file
description: Reads the contents and metadata of a file by its ID.

name: update-file
description: Updates the contents of a file by its ID.

name: upload-file-api
description: Uploads a new file to Google Drive with raw or base64 content.

name: delete-file
description: Deletes a file from Google Drive by its ID.
